data.message: Sir i have an other facebook id  .i forget the password of my facebook id, and i aldo forhet the password of gmail id.i have only my mobile number on facebook id,but facebbok does not show the mobile option ...what will i do to recover my account???

replies.message: Hi, Real. Please keep in mind that Facebook is a community where people use their authentic identities. It's against the Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account and you need to use your authentic identity. You can close or recover an old account. Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/231208473756221. -Rhea
Sir after the forget password issue i use this id. The id which i forget password is my very useful id and original ..i want to recover it back.kindly help me...
